content.title: SaaS TERMS OF SERVICE
key_sections: 1. SERVICE: Cloud-based [SERVICE_DESCRIPTION]. Accessible 24/7 subject to scheduled maintenance. 99.9% uptime SLA (B2B) / reasonable availability (B2C).
2. ACCOUNT: You create account. Responsible for security. Notify us of unauthorized use. Must be 18+ (or 13+ with parental consent).
3. SUBSCRIPTION: [PLAN_OPTIONS]. Fees: Â£[MONTHLY/ANNUAL]. Auto-renewal unless cancelled. Price changes: [30] days' notice.
4. FREE TRIAL: [TRIAL_DAYS] days free. Cancel anytime. Auto-converts to paid unless cancelled.
5. PAYMENT: By credit card. Failed payment: [RETRY_ATTEMPTS], then suspension. Refunds: [REFUND_POLICY - B2C: 14-day cooling off under CCR 2013].
6. CONSUMER CANCELLATION (B2C): 14-day right to cancel from signup (CCR 2013). Refund within 14 days. If used service, pay proportionate amount.
7. B2B CANCELLATION: [NOTICE_PERIOD] notice to end of billing period. No refunds for partial periods.
8. DATA: You own Your Data. We process per DPA and Privacy Policy. You license us to host/process. Backup: [POLICY]. On termination: [EXPORT_PERIOD] to export, then deleted.
9. ACCEPTABLE USE: No illegal use, malware, spam, disruption, reverse engineering, or excessive resource use. Violation: suspension/termination.
10. IP: We own Service IP. You own Your Content. You grant us license to host/display.
11. WARRANTY (B2C): Service fit for purpose, as described, satisfactory quality (Consumer Rights Act 2015). Remedies: repair, refund, price reduction.
12. WARRANTY (B2B): Reasonable skill and care. No other warranties.
13. LIABILITY (B2C): No limit for death/injury, fraud, or statutory rights. Reasonable liability for other loss.
14. LIABILITY (B2B): Limited to [fees paid in 12 months]. No consequential loss. No limit for death/injury or fraud.
15. CHANGES: We may update Terms on [30] days' notice. Continued use = acceptance. Material changes: right to cancel.
16. SUSPENSION: For breach, non-payment, or legal compliance. Notice where possible.
17. TERMINATION: We may terminate for breach (cure period) or at will (B2B: [NOTICE]). You may cancel per clause 6/7.
18. DATA PROTECTION: Privacy Policy: [LINK]. GDPR compliant. DPA available for B2B customers.
19. SECURITY: Industry-standard encryption, access controls, monitoring. Notify breaches per GDPR.
20. GOVERNING LAW: English law. Disputes: Courts of England and Wales (B2B) / consumer's country (B2C).
content.compliance_notes: B2C vs B2B distinction critical. Consumer rights cannot be excluded.
